distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Vehicle dataset dataset

distribution.name: CAR DETAILS FROM CAR DEKHO.csv
distribution.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars.
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.

distribution.name: Car details v3.csv
distribution.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars listed on different websites
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.

distribution.name: car data.csv
distribution.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars listed on different websites
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.
**The columns in the given dataset is as follows**:

 1. Car_Name
 2. Year
 3. Selling_Price
 4. Present_Price
 5. Kms_Driven
 6. Fuel_Type
 7. Seller_Type
 8. Transmission
 9. Owner

distribution.name: car details v4.csv
distribution.description:
This dataset was made by webscrpaing .
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.

field.name: name
field.description: Name of the cars

field.name: year
field.description: Year of the car when it was bought

field.name: selling_price
field.description: Price at which the car is being sold

field.name: km_driven
field.description: Number of Kilometres the car is driven

field.name: fuel
field.description: Fuel type of car (petrol / diesel / CNG / LPG / electric)

field.name: seller_type
field.description: Tells if a Seller is Individual or a Dealer

field.name: transmission
field.description: Gear transmission of the car (Automatic/Manual)

field.name: owner
field.description: Number of previous owners of the car.

recordSet.name: CAR DETAILS FROM CAR DEKHO.csv
recordSet.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars.
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.

field.name: name
field.description: name of the car

field.name: year
field.description: year in which car was bought

field.name: selling_price
field.description: selling price of the car

field.name: km_driven
field.description: number of kilometers the car is driven

field.name: fuel
field.description: fuel type of the car

field.name: seller_type
field.description: tells if car is sold by individual or dealer

field.name: transmission
field.description: Gear transmission of the car (Automatic/Manual)

field.name: owner
field.description: number of previous owners

field.name: mileage
field.description: mileage of the car

field.name: engine
field.description: engine capacity of the car

field.name: max_power
field.description: max power of engine

field.name: torque
field.description: torque of the car

field.name: seats
field.description: number of seats in the car

recordSet.name: Car details v3.csv
recordSet.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars listed on different websites
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.

field.name: Car_Name
field.description: This column should be filled with the name of the car.

field.name: Year
field.description: This column should be filled with the year in which the car was bought.

field.name: Selling_Price
field.description: This column should be filled with the price the owner wants to sell the car at.

field.name: Present_Price
field.description: This is the current ex-showroom price of the car.

field.name: Kms_Driven
field.description: This is the distance completed by the car in km.

field.name: Fuel_Type
field.description: Fuel type of the car.

field.name: Seller_Type
field.description: Defines whether the seller is a dealer or an individual.

field.name: Transmission
field.description: Defines whether the car is manual or automatic.

field.name: Owner
field.description: Defines the number of owners the car has previously had.

recordSet.name: car data.csv
recordSet.description:
This dataset contains information about used cars listed on different websites
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.
**The columns in the given dataset is as follows**:

 1. Car_Name
 2. Year
 3. Selling_Price
 4. Present_Price
 5. Kms_Driven
 6. Fuel_Type
 7. Seller_Type
 8. Transmission
 9. Owner

field.name: Make
field.description: Company Of the car

field.name: Model
field.description: Name of the cae

field.name: Price
field.description: Selling Price of the car in INR

field.name: Year
field.description: Manufacturing Year of the car

field.name: Kilometer
field.description: Total kilometers Driven

field.name: Fuel Type
field.description: Fuel type of the car

field.name: Transmission
field.description: Gear transmission of the car

field.name: Location
field.description: City in which car is being sold

field.name: Color
field.description: Color of the car

field.name: Owner
field.description: Number of previous owners

field.name: Seller Type
field.description: tells if car is sold by individual or dealer

field.name: Engine
field.description: engine capacity of the car in cc

field.name: Max Power
field.description: Max Power in bhp@rpm

field.name: Max Torque
field.description: MAx Torque in Nm@rpm

field.name: Drivetrain
field.description: AWD/RWD/FWD

field.name: Length
field.description: length of the car in mm

field.name: Width
field.description: width of the car in mm

field.name: Height
field.description: height of the car in mm

field.name: Seating Capacity
field.description: Maximum people that can fir in a car

field.name: Fuel Tank Capacity
field.description: Maximum fuel capacity of the car in litres

name: Vehicle dataset
description:
This dataset contains information about used cars.
This data can be used for a lot of purposes such as price prediction to exemplify the use of linear regression in Machine Learning.
**The columns in the given dataset are as follows**:

 1. name
 2. year
 3. selling_price
 5. km_driven
 6. fuel
 7. seller_type
 8. transmission
 9. Owner
